channel.title: hugo on Binbean's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Binbean's Blog

item.title: 添加Gitment评论
item.description: 注册 前往https://github.com/settings/applications/new注册一个新的OAuth Application

item.title: Hello Hugo
item.description: 新建文章 1 hugo new post/blog-name.md 运行hugo 1 hugo server --watch --buildDrafts 部署到GitHub Pages 1 2 hugo -D hugo --theme=hyde --baseUrl="http://binbean.github.io/" 1 2 3 4 5 6 cd public git init git remote add origin https://github.com/binbean/binbean.github.io.git git add -A git commit -m "first commit" git push -u origin master
